thread.title: BRIEF-NCR Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.38

title: BRIEF-NCR Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.38
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - NCR Corp:
* NCR ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.38 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.30 TO $3.45 * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.41 TO $0.47 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.08 TO $2.48 * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.16 TO $0.29 * Q4 REVENUE FELL 1 PERCENT TO $1.78 BILLION * SAYS $300 MILLION SHARE REPURCHASE PLANNED FOR 2018 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.87, REVENUE VIEW $1.75 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.56, REVENUE VIEW $1.52 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.34, REVENUE VIEW $6.67 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
